Long-ranged infantry with low hitpoints, but a strong attack. Good against heavy infantry.
Put out another call to arms! We will not succumb to such cowardice!
Parade with me, my brave fellows — we will have them soon!
Interwoven as is the love of liberty with every ligament of your hearts, the recommendation of mine is necessary to fortify and confirm.
Our artillery will soon be on its way.
A cavalry detatchment is riding to your aid as we speak.
A handpicked regiment of our best men will arrive shortly.
We do not like to be taxed excessively; be careful what you ask of us.
It is not in my strategic interest.
I have thus far avoided the necessity of those overgrown military establishments, which, under any form of government, are inauspicious to liberty.
My fellow Americans would rather fight to their deaths.
It is infinitely better to have a few good men than many indifferent ones, but I have none to spare for now.
Our trading posts have been raided! I will dispatch an expedition to punish the perpetrators!
The Aztecs' logistics are worse than ours during the Revolutionary War. Let us put an end to this.
Can I offer you some tax-free tea while we watch the British Empire collapse?
Even the Dutch will concede that the best thing about New Amsterdam was that it became New York!
Those French white flags are no match for our muskets.
Do you think that the Germans will learn after we have defeated them once?
Let us show the Ottomans what a real bombardment looks like!
The Portuguese Empire overextended itself. What chance does a single empire stand against one republic out of many states?
The last Russian soldiers are hiding in a wooden fort, but I have already ordered my men to tear down this wall!
Neither the angels nor Saint Francis will be able to help the Spanish avert their defeat now.
The old Swedish Empire will soon join New Sweden as the next addition to our union.
Let us give China a taste of its own gunpowder.
The Japanese may have surprised us in the beginning, but they did not have the endurance to fight for long.
Those Indian elephants might have scared my militiamen, but the Continental Army cannot be routed so easily.
Many nations admire eagles. It seems that the Aztec eagle may very well beat our own if we do not act soon.
The number of British Redcoats is quite intimidating. Fortunately, their red color makes them easy targets!
The Dutch fight so vigorously, it is as if they consider New Amsterdam to be their actual capital.
The French are going too far by bringing their revolution to us — but I suppose that we might have inspired them.
A deadly offensive by all the Germans is imminent. As if these Hessian mercenaries weren't enough!
The Ottomans do not bombard you with questions, for they have far more practice in bombarding towns. Our towns.
The Portuguese have some good shots in their army. Even our best firearms seem to be no match.
The Tsar's forces are preparing for a rush. Be vigilant!
The Spanish have assembled a sizable army! Let us see how their tercios hold up against our infantry tactics.
The Swedes are expanding their empire. We must push them back!
Chinese inventors are trying to outsmart us. We must not allow that to happen!
Japan is building up its empire. Let us entice them out of their isolation — it will prove quite profitable.
It seems that we are not the only nation that is growing rich after expelling the British.
Good work, my friend. We will follow your example shortly.
Would you mind sharing your scientific progress with us?
My generals have advised me not to linger in the first age. Perhaps you should take that advice as well.
Your scientists have some catching up to do.
Perseverance and spirit have done wonders in all ages.
Welcome to the enlightened era — we have been waiting for you.
Is it wise to continue our fight?
My settlements are under attack! Send your army, and my militias will buy time to organize a defense!
The time is now near at hand which must probably determine whether Americans are to be freemen or slaves.
Liberty, when it begins to take root, is a plant of rapid growth.
The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
My men will still fight with the same vigor, even if it only means winning faster.
You have proven yourself a wise general. I am pleased to have your expertise on our side.
I, this day, declare with the utmost sincerity, I do not think myself equal to the presence I am honored with.
I am pleased to see that you have decided to join our alliance.
Fear not, old friend — I will bring us victory once more.

It is not a little pleasing, nor less wonderful to contemplate, that both armies are brought back to the very point they set out from, and the offending party in the beginning is now reduced to the use of the spade and pickaxe for defence.
Let us work together, and we will be unstoppable this time.
Let us prove once more that our alliance cannot be defeated.
They dared to take my explorer hostage. I had no choice but to pay an outrageous ransom!
Few men have the virtue to withstand the highest bidder.
Check in your pocket — the quarter is me too.
Our granaries are full enough, we have sent what we can spare.
Oley Valley's fields have produced enough of a surplus to feed both of us for some time.
We sent you about one redwood tree. Knock on wood!
Our great wilderness has all the lumber that we need.
My army will strike their bases to cut off further reinforcements!
We will burn their homes to the ground, and the rest of their empire shall soon follow.
This punitive expedition will teach the locals to never dare to side with the enemy again!
There is a trade embargo against you — we are about to enforce it.
Experience teaches us that it is much easier to prevent an enemy from posting themselves than it is to dislodge them after they have got possession.
I will increase my military production. The enemy will be overwhelmed by our masses.
My pioneers will quickly establish a new town center.
We have a gold rush in our lands. I will share some of the nuggets with you.
Thanks to steel plows and canals, we have an abundance of food.
We had to clear some forests to expand our empire of liberty — have some lumber.
Washington will always help an ally in need.
To be prepared for war is one of the most effectual means of preserving peace.
It seems that the enemy has decided to avoid treading on us today.
I am under no apprehension of a capital injury from any other source than that of the continual depreciation of our money. I am thus required to ask for support in foreign currency.
My armies have run out of supplies! We need food to strengthen our numbers.
Our military flutists have no instruments with which to play music, for our wood stock is diminishing. Can you spare some?
Your payment has been received. I owe you a great deal.
Thanks to your supplies, we will fight the enemy with renewed vigor.
Many thanks. I've passed the wood to my engineers. They wouldn't stop talking about 'repeating guns' and 'breechloaders'.
The Aztecs have sent us the shield, arrows, and cloaks. I fear that our defeat is imminent.
I heard that the British King George found me quite revolting, but I believe that is why we are losing.
How do the Dutch successfully control such a vast empire from such a tiny spot in Europe?
I hope that we are pardoned by the French.
The Germans seem very upset about not being able to read our laws in their language. I suggest that we let them settle in Pennsylvania!
We have been cut down like a cherry tree.
I am afraid to construct new magazines. The Ottoman artillery barrage is too heavy.
In our history, we never had to fight against the Portuguese. It should have stayed this way.
It was foolish of me to believe that the Russians could be toppled as easily as the British with the mere size of our militia army.
It seems unlikely that the Spanish are going to decide between California and Texas. They will get them both back.
Did no one tell the Swedes that monarchies are outdated? They were supposed to lose!
That was not fair! The Chinese have hundreds of years' more experience with gunpowder weapons.
I have a feeling that we should not have given the Japanese a reason to leave their island.
Why did we decide to fight against camels and elephants again?
The Aztecs bribed our naive militiamen with chocolate. This defeat is bittersweet.
We have driven the British into financial ruin as planned, but at what cost?
Losing half of their country to Spain only made those Dutch better at fighting.
Is it too late to return Louisiana for a refund?
My ill-disciplined militiamen agreed to drink with the Germans. Soon we will all eat sauerkraut!
How are we expected to win against a foe that knows these lands like their back pocket?
I knew that it was over when our soldiers started following the Ottoman marching bands rather than our own.
An entire militia regiment was routed by a single Portuguese organ gun. I can already hear the organ music from the funeral.
That was not a fair fight — the Russians were rushing us!
It is time to blow a little big horn of retreat!
My lousy militiamen went home, claiming that the light reflecting off the shiny Spanish armor and weapons made it impossible to aim.
The Swedes brought a knife to a gunfight — and still won.
So many unique units that we just could not counter all of them.
One more of those banzai charges and my nation will be overrun.
The Indians might not have built the most impressive wonders this time, but they impressively defeated my army.
We are outgunned — outmanned — outnumbered — outplanned.
There can be no greater error than to expect, or calculate, upon real favors from nation to nation.
My first wish is to see this plague of mankind, war, banished from the earth.
It is an honor to serve at your side, my friend. Let me know if you are interested in joining the Union.
Do not worry, my friend — war is not for everyone. I can handle this if you wish to stay back and manage your economy for some time.

Though, in reviewing the incidents of my administration, I am unconscious of intentional error, I am nevertheless too sensible of my defects not to think it probable that I may have committed many errors.
The Fire of Freedom is quenched. Let us accept defeat before our nation is nothing but ruins.
I have fought hard for the American dream, but now I must face reality and accept defeat.
Our enemy lives a life of wealth through trade. If we let them continue like this, it will put my treasury to shame.
The natives of this region are wise and powerful. I would be prudent to introduce myself to them as well.
Nice find! My explorer is still warming up, it seems.
You can send it to me — I will invest it wisely.
Enjoy your snack and the American way of life.
You are doing well in this scavenger hunt.
I was about to go get that one, but have a nice day.
Recruiting the help of the locals has won many a battle.
You can build some fine architecture with those materials.
Give me liberty — or give me coin!
I discovered where the wild wings are.
You are a capable leader. You do not need this little treasure.
To me, the hunt for treasure fits together perfectly with the pursuit of happiness.
I will recruit some natives. They have valuable skills that will complement my armies.
I am always happy to accept a few more laborers in the Union.
Some lumber to expand further into the wilderness.
Sometimes it is prudent to occupy a position and fortify it.
Hold on just a little longer, and we have this one in the bag!
It looks like it is time to enact my secret master plan.
I hope that this taught you a little lesson in trickery.
You might have the technology, but I have the army.
Do not worry about aging up. We will soon come to civilize your empire.
Is your education system a little behind?
I have decided to delay my advancement to give you a chance.
I am impressed. Will you learn to read next?
We have been waiting for you. Actually, I was about to advance again.
You seem alone. I will send an army to keep you company.
Did you really think that I would confuse my ally's town with yours?
We do not accept such greedy restrictions on our free trade!
The preservation of the sacred fire of liberty is entrusted to the hands of the American people. Are you American?
I will not be going easy on you this time.
Let us see who wins when we are more familiar with the land.
Do you need all of these allies to fight against my United States?
We will not be going easy on you this time.
Welcome to the land of the free. Your explorer is also free to leave.
Your militia does not stand a chance against mine. I am not impressed.
What are you doing here? Providing target practice for my men?
All you have done is to awaken a sleeping giant and fill him with a terrible resolve.
My base is fortified and my men are rested. Are you sure about this attack?
Are you sure that you want to occupy my town? I am good at fighting off oppressors.
Are you sending us men to fill the ranks of our militia army? That is very nice of you.
Is that your state? It seems too small and irrelevant to join the United States of America.
I am George Washington and I believe in life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness — but not for you.
My name is George Washington and I'm the president of the United States of America. And all of these states have united to defeat you.
The unfortunate condition of the persons, whose labour in part I employed, has been the only unavoidable subject of regret.
It is better to offer no excuse than a bad one.
If you want to do it the hard way, we can arrange that.
Do not expect to get more than that.
You can collect as many treasures as you wish — my army will crush you just the same.
Why are you in such a gold rush? It is just a bad California dream.
Were you starving so badly that you started eating from the floor?
What are you? Some kind of bounty hunter? I shall put this into the Marshal's matters.
Will you keep roaming the country forever or eventually start a real business?
I will not accept such thievery!
Are you bribing the locals? I doubt that they would follow you on their own accord.
I think that those settlers will regret their choice soon enough.
I have no use for such puny treasures.
Are you hiding? Those walls will not keep you safe.
The native inhabitants simply like me better than you.
The first of many — I will build an empire of free trade.
A small prize for a man, but a huge fortune for mankind.
I heard that finding a penny brings luck. This is a good omen.
That is what I call fast food.
It looks like you did not want that one anyways.
I have found so many treasures. I will exhibit this notoriously big collection in the White House.
The locals offer their friendship. We should count ourselves fortunate.
We welcome those yearning to breathe free. I am sure that more will join soon.
I think that I found about half of a redwood tree, and will put it to good use.
We do not need any help to triumph over your puny empire.
This trading post will not enable you to rise from rags to riches, but you can wipe the place clean and get out of there.
You think that you can defeat us when it comes to trade? I doubt that.
We do not need violence when we can win with the power of capitalism.
Bring the mortars and every blade and man you can! We must stop them now!
One minute, one monopoly, one magnificent victory for us! The Holy Trinity!
Nothing would please me more, friend.
The Order will put everything in order!
You men, with me! Bring that bombard.
Understood. Send the knights through the fort and wipe out those bombards!
The armies of heaven, wearing pure, white linen, will follow you on white horses.
Our brethren mercilessly march to your mission, lord.
My coffers are empty and my gunpowder is depleted.
I must respectfully decline. This is not in the interest of the order.
I have a few weapons left, but no soldiers to carry them.
I have the faith, but not the means.
New recruits are still arriving as we speak.
We have reduced the United States into one last United State.
What do you think, my dear ally? If Aztec Coyote Runners were knighted, would they be Blade Runner Knights?
It is settled. Compared to this British pirate Elisabeth, the brethren of Malta are the better islanders!
The Dutch may be bleeding coins, but – they are bleeding!
I regret the need to destroy my old French homeland, but this apostasy could not be tolerated!
The Germans are almost defeated. Since their "holy empire" is already divided, we only need to split the spoils!
The Iroquois still have a longhouse left, but our blades are cutting it shorter by the minute.
After we capture Italy, I will rename Sicily to "Great Malta".
Gran Colombia has revolted one too many times. I suggest the Order should be their next government.
We have beaten back the Ottoman invasion at Malta – we will beat them back again!
My Order may have lost some islands in the past, but the Portuguese just lost one too many Town Centers!
It seems the Russian Tsar was fighting us as much as his own people – and lost to both.
We have taken out all Sioux teepees – nowhere left to hide!
The Spanish treasure fleet is ours – and anything else they were hiding!
The Swedish have charged the wrong hill to die on. Now they are over the hills and far away.
The Chinese walls were built on sand. They will not last long now.
We will not chop off any heads like the Japanese Samurai. Having to live with their defeat will be much worse for them.
Putting guns on camels was a bad idea. They wiggle too much while running!
The Americans are in my dreams. Cowboys chase me through the night to the beat of their gatling guns!
These Obsidian arrowheads of the Aztec Arrow Knights are incredible! Cannons appear like a malinvestment now.
Their rockets look more frightening than they are, but their longbows are more frightening than they look.
The Dutch can hold out in a siege for a decade, but so can I!
I had a premonition of my fate, it was the hoof of a French cuirassier.
The German needle guns are turning my knights into hedgehogs!
Iroquois cannons might be light, but they still shoot heavy cannonballs!
The Italians have a lot faith in themselves. I understand this is why their architects construct these great Basilicas.
The Colombians achieved the impossible and formed Gran Colombia. Now they're scarier than ever!
The Ottoman army seems to be strong, but they forget one thing: THIS - IS - MALTA!
The Portuguese expansion is concerning. We either bring our cannons in range – or wait for their Town Centers to be in range.
The Russian aggression is relentless! Their nimble Cossacks seem to slip through the cracks in our walls.
I saw heaven standing open. There was a white horse, and its rider is named Faithful and True. With integrity, he judges and wages war. He is the Sioux Rifle Rider.
If we do not take action soon, my beloved Malta will become a Spanish colony.
The Swedish king Gustavus seems to have more than one ace up his sleeve.
The Chinese weapons are as innovative as ours, but it is the sheer amount of gunpowder that may pulverize our forts.
I am starting to understand why Japan was never conquered, whereas our order may have lost an island – or two.
The Indian economy flourishes, but it is based on wood. Let us throw flames, rockets, and burning hoops at it!
Your progress is a shining example for all allies and enemies alike!
I admire the technological prowess displayed by your people. Care to share your secrets with the Order?
May you have forgotten to send shipments from the Home City? Or were they intercepted by ... Pirates?! Aarg! I hate those pirates!
You should read a good book. Or better, a whole library! Then you will see the light! – of the next age.
Such an impressive start, my ally! You may now cast the first stone at our sinful enemies!
I held them back while you aged up, now it's your turn!
Malta has been overrun! We need to find a new island, again!
My knights are under siege once again. Send reinforcements, we will make them pay!
I am Alain Magnan! The shield of Europe! The 49th Grand Inquisitor of the Order of the Knights of Saint John of Jerusalem!
Together, we can beat any challenge fate can put before us!
This will be a walk in the park, with an enemy Town Center in the way.
Your skills have impressed me last game, now I will show you some of mine!
Maybe you can teach this old Templar some new tricks.
Had enough sparring with me? Let us try our teamwork, then.
I do not mind doing the heavy lifting, but you can take the lead this round.
Once more unto the breach, dear friend! Same old breach!
Our ship is badly damaged. Start a colony on this land and wait for more ships to arrive from Malta.
Our alliance was already unstoppable last game! Now that we are warmed up, they have no chance!
I once got captured by Barbary Pirates and held on a galley for a year. Now I am Grand Inquisitor.
I sent you a boatload of financial support.
My fishermen have delivered their last catch on their Luzzus right to your stockpiles.
This land has more forests than we are used to from Malta.
Sound the trumpets — it is time for a charge!
Let us hit them where it hurts! — their trading posts.
Today we fight! A wall of steel bound by our vows.
I will build a fortress here, a lighthouse of safety in a sea of darkness.
Our Covered Wagon has arrived. We must use it to build a Town Center near the Trading Post.
You will get your gold, but be cautious. These are unfamiliar waters.
I intend to build an economy ready to feed an army of lions! I might have some food over for yours as well.
I ordered too many saws and axes. I intend to put them all to use so I will have some wood to send for your own building projects.
I will never abandon a friend in time of need, my brethren are ready to restore order wherever necessary!
My soldiers are getting tired of guard service. We need a proper battle to bring everyone back in line!
Our corso was not as successful as I hoped, do you have gold to spare for the upkeep of my army?
My grain shipments were stolen by pirates. Could you please spare some for my people?
The construction of my new capital was halted due to a lack of timber. If you can send some, I will dedicate the next building to your honor!
I am both terrified and amazed by the innovative weaponry of the Americans. They beat us at our own game.
Those Aztec Skull Knights seem more knightly than my own ones! They truly fight to the bone.
It is like the Battle of Crécy all over again: British Longbowmen defeating heavily armored knights.
The Dutch must be manipulating the tulip markets again, with the way they are making bank.
Sacre bleu! Even our finest halberds have trouble dealing with fully upgraded French Cuirassiers!
The Germans are as heavily armored as we are, but they outsmarted us by putting everything on wheels.
Maybe our men of faith could learn a thing or two from the Iroquois ceremonies. They seem more ... powerful.
Maybe Malta should have been a part of the reunification of Italy. It is looking grim for us – and I actually speak Italian!
The healing powers of the Colombian Padre puts our order's hospitals to shame. We have a lot to learn.
I am not ready to die just yet to the Ottoman Falcon! And I do not intend to see our knighthood broken!
The Portuguese Organ Guns provide the thundering sound to the funeral rites. Our funeral rites.
The Russian blockhouses encircle us like hungry birds a shoal of fish. Alas, Malta is a nice place for fishing.
My army is out of breath! Running away from Sioux horses all day!
I am not sure what more to be afraid of: The Spanish army or the Spanish Inquisition?
My Infantry fears the Swedish cannons, my cavalry their pikes. We need a victory soon for morale to improve!
I wonder how the Chinese got such a wonderful economy.
The Japanese copied and mastered the art of island hopping – unfortunately, Malta is an island.
The Indian tactics are treacherous. Their priests would not harm a fly, yet the very elephant they ride stomps us into submission!
What the American Militia lacks in fighting skills they make up with numbers. And they lack a lot of skill.
We simply did not have enough time to figure out the inner workings of the Aztec army.
I admit, it was foolish to assume these British islanders only wanted to "construct some houses".
The Dutch got us all into deep waters — I cannot swim in my heavy armor!
My puny settlers had no chance against the French raids and even worse: the French Coureurs had no issue with mine!
The Germans may receive less shipments than we do, but it is like they say: Never look a gift horse in the mouth.
The Iroquois hatchets do not fly far, but far enough.
My Sentinels stopped guarding our fort as soon as they spotted some Italian relatives behind their big pavise shields.
We should have brought our boats to avoid drowning in a sea of insurgents.
Move the crossbows to the forward walls to attack the janissaries! Defend the fort at all costs!
If only we could have fought in a crusade with the Portuguese instead of engaging in this senseless destruction of each other!
Another Russian Strelet for my toy soldier collection! I think I have a full set! – We can give up now!
My spies reported that the Lakota had no houses at all, so we concluded they posed no threat. We were wrong.
We keep shooting at the Spanish, but their Missionaries are doing God's work!
The Swedes would eventually eat the fish my people considered inedible. There is no winning wars with gourmets!
I was hoping to beat the Chinese into a powder as fine as the dust, but to bite the dust is what they made us do.
Had I known how long it takes for reinforcements from Malta to arrive in Japan, I would never have agreed to this 'raid'.
My brethren had no chance to practise fighting against Camels and Elephants on the island we live.
It is looking grim for us. We need to sail right away before the storm breaks loose!
Do not despair, my friend! Come, and seek shelter behind my walls to regain your strength for the last stand!
With you and the Lord by my side, I have nothing to fear!
With me by your side, you have nothing to fear!
My Citadel is out of supplies. The walls are reduced to rubble. We must fight to the last man or offer our surrender.
First Cyprus! Then Rhodes! Now Malta is lost, too – but we can still save our lives and sail to another island!
We are the Knights of Saint John, we do not surrender! – We could, however, sail away.
The enemy tries to starve us out! Quick! Attack their trade routes!
We should make some allies among the locals. The enemy has the edge on us now.
Ah! Very good! I assume you intend to donate your findings to my order? For the good cause.
More treasures! An interesting source of income for my order I will continue to explore.
You must be blessed by fate to find coin so easily. Care to show me the next spot?
An army marches on its stomach! Keep that Explorer moving.
Thou shalt not steal and love your neighbor as yourself! So says the holy book.
I am sure there are more natives around. We should make sure we scout the entire area.
Blessed are the merciful, for they will be shown mercy!
Wood! It may seem plain and ordinary, but it is the source of great power. Mark my words!
A nice cache of war supplies!
Stolen gold – confiscated! And put to good use in the name of the Lord.
These food supplies will keep my treasuring expeditions fed until they find an even bigger treasure.
I had to protect this treasure – an enemy explorer had his eyes on it for too long!
Do you know how treasuring works? It is a point and click adventure, first the guardians, then the treasure.
I found a stranger who promised to fight for us – maybe he has a grudge with our opponents.
A settler was lost in the woods and now was found, by me.
You can never wall yourself in too early! I will build an indestructible citadel that can withstand ten years of siege!
Once our trade network is as well-connected as my knightly order rulers from all over, the world will obey to our will.
Ha-ha! Time to bring out my secret demolition squad sitting behind your base!
I would like to play a game: Trip to Jerusalem! The player without access to my trade route gets eliminated. Go!
Racing ahead with no goal in mind will only get you lost.
It must be a divine sign that a small knightly order puts your presumptuous "empire" to shame!
Hanging in old ages for nostalgia will not win wars. Even our oldest knights know how to fire a musket by now.
Rushing ahead gives you little without the resources to capitalize on it.
What were you still looking for in the previous age? Courage? Chivalry? Power? We already took all of it.
No amount of gold is enough to weigh up your sins. That is why I should take that gold.
Chivalry is dead, which means that I am the last proper knight in this battle.
Tell me, however unlikely that is, have you ever heard of the Circle of Ossus?
If you win this I might consider inviting you to one of my many secret organizations.
Last time was a good warmup, this time do not pull any punches!
I have been to this place before. You could call it a Déjà-vu.
Your eyes are full of fire. On your head, too many crowns. Yet you will cry out for help—there will be no one to save you.
What is your untalented explorer trying to find in my base? The fountain of youth? Is he not a bit too old for that?
Your ragtag band of bandits does not scare me.
Your blades are as dull as your men.
You come not to bring peace, but to bring the sword. Now let us see how blades fare against stone walls!
Do you see those walls? My order can hold out until reinforcements arrive.
You gained no honor from this victory, only a small island.
Are you always picking on someone smaller than yourself?
Be careful now, I know where you live.
All quiet on the front today. Do you maybe want to attempt a siege tomorrow? I would like to test some new explosives.
The ancient ruins of Malta hold secrets many have tried to uncover.
Your show of force has left a lasting impression on my troops. Would you like to challenge me for the role of Grand Inquisitor?
An honorable loss against a worthy opponent. Shall we end all hostilities now?
My trade! I will tear your economy apart for this!
Do not get too fond of your find, I will destroy whatever you use it on.
I have more important matters to attend to. Keep that treasure.
All these coins you gather will be confiscated by my brethren – sooner or later.
That food pales in comparison to what my fishermen are bringing in every minute.
Hoard all treasures like a dragon, you will still be slain by this knight.
You use your actions on treasures, I use them on the preparation of your demise.
Such brazen disrespect to the property of a knight will not be accepted!
I did not want him to join my forces anyways, he would only slow my men down.
Build all you want with it, our ingenious engineers invented plenty of ways to set things aflame!
Your bulwark of cowardice will not stand. No crack, no gap in your wall goes unnoticed by legendary defenders like us!
I have met an order of independent warriors and we saw that our interests align, your destruction.
Come to my trading post! I trade bible quotes for coin. It is a unique experience.
The Lord giveth and the Lord taketh away.
Even a Templar is more motivated if he also fights for a good sum of gold.
This field ration will keep my brothers healthy and full of energy!
If you wanted it, you should have sent your explorer to get it.
Do not worry about treasures, I almost got them all by now.
A new member for our Order!
No amount of gold is enough to weigh up your sins.
Not on my watch, my friend. Not on my watch!
This monopoly will be the final nail in the coffin of your empire!
Gather your strength, our people must break the monopoly!
Soon we will have the victory our people deserve, without the violence that usually accompanies it.
Action must be taken at once; there is no time to be lost!
We are preparing to move the cannons. These models are a bit older, you see.
Our fine horses will crush the oppressors!
My footmen are in a frenzy, thirsting for a good fight!
Our people have been robbed for generations! We cannot afford to help you at this time.
Not now, my friend. You see, it's siesta.
I must recruit more revolutionaries first.
I am sorry, I could not square my conscience with this.
The Colombian army is still growing. I cannot send it into battle quite yet.
The enemy will not let us win without a fight. Let us show them justice!
We could have fought united with the United States of America against European influence, instead of fighting each other.
Many native tribes have joined Gran Colombia. The Aztecs can join as well.
The British cannot even control their own colonies. What did they expect to happen against us?
The Dutch make much more formidable allies than enemies.
We will make the French regret ever meddling in our affairs!
The German states might find themselves at a crossroads after this.
The Iroquois nations are strongest when they work together. Perhaps today they had a disagreement.
The Ottomans should have steered clear of South America. The climate is not what they're accustomed to.
The Portuguese should have listened to the Pope. This is not their land.
The Russians had their chance in America and sold it. Perhaps they don't value victory as much.
The Sioux were worthy opponents, but it is now time to stop the bloodshed.
When tyranny becomes law, rebellion is a right. The Spaniards have learned that today.
The Swedish king loses his temper too easily. If he kept a cool head like me, he may have had a chance.
The Italians could have made formidable trading partners. Now, they will be formidable vassals.
Do the Maltese wish to discuss their surrender with us?
Before long, the Chinese consulate will host a fine feast for our ambassadors to sign their terms of surrender.
No amount of isolation will help Japan now.
I am empathetic of the Indian cause against European empires, but I will not allow them to stand in our way.
The American forces are saber-rattling on our borders. We must form a united front against them!
The Aztec Empire has recovered and is about to reclaim dominance!
I see houses lining the horizon - a frightful sight when fighting the British.
These Dutch Ruyters are a greater plague than mosquitoes! And they can't be banished with smoke, either.
A rumble in the distance! France must be parading its cavalry again.
Another shipment for the German economy means another Uhlan in our economy, wreaking havoc.
The sun shines on the expanding Iroquois lands. That is why they always see us coming.
We lie on opposite ends of the Spanish sphere of influence, but with no Spaniards to fight, the Ottomans must be building their army to fight us next!
I would attack the Portuguese, but everywhere my men raid, they run into another of their town centers.
The Russian Empire is coming! Grab your sarape and prepare for a long winter.
My men feel ill-equipped to fend off the growing Sioux threat. And the trade negotiations from our envoys were also turned down.
Our Spanish oppressors are trying to gain control. We should drive them from our land, once and for all!
These Swedes are putting up quite a fight against our Guerrilleros. Have your machete ready at hand to fend off their charges!
The Italians control almost everything around us. We should disrupt their economy!
The Maltese knights will mercilessly ravage our lands if we do not push back with faith, blood and iron.
The Chinese Empire is growing strong!
At least Japan sees us as an equal nation, but not in a friendly way, I'm afraid.
I hear entire forests falling in the distance. India must be expanding its economy.
I hope that you can share some benefits from the next age with us.
Knowledge is power my friend, consider advancing with your town center soon.
Are you rushing the enemy? Do not worry, I will secure our technological advantage in the meantime.
You do not yet have wings and already want to fly.
Welcome to the path of progress.
Let us surrender and live, lest our people be doomed.
The enemy is at my gates, send reinforcements!
Hello there. Are you Amelia Black's friend? I have heard a lot about you. How is she doing these days?
I do not take lightly the responsibility that my people have entrusted me with.
Another day, another foe that wants to bring down our nations.
I have learned to make the right alliances after my last defeat.
With you by my side, we have nothing to fear.
The art of victory is learned in defeat.
Have you learned from our last endeavor?
To do something right, it must be done twice. The first time instructs the second.
Will the fighting in these lands never cease?
No playing around this time! Bring everything that you have! Machetes, plows, staffs...
Nothing can go wrong fighting for a righteous cause.
My General fell into enemy hands. I had to pay an absurd sum, but he will be worth it!
Our silver mines have made my people rich… and now you as well.
Now that we are no longer robbed by excessive taxation, we can share some coin with you.
An army marches on its stomach.
My people gathered an excess of food, we will let you have some of it.
A shipment of wood from my homeland recently arrived. I have sent you some of it.
I recently taught my villagers to use a new type of saw. If you need more wood in the future, research it at the market as well.
We must bring the enemy to their knees. I will attack their base at once!
My Soldados are eager to reclaim this town in our name!
Let us free the natives from their oppression!
Their trade is their weakness. I will strike now and cut them off from any future shipments.
We shall yet see the oppressors' yoke broken and the fragments scattered on the ground.
This will be a fine place to construct a new base.
Will you join the celebration for my new Town Center?
Our Plantations are overproducing. Here! We want to share the profits with a good friend.
Our stores are bursting with food! Of course we will share it with our allies.
I do not know what to do with all this wood, would you take some off our hands?
My army is restless. If you need a hand, we will help you defend.
Every day that we rest, we are not bringing justice to the enemy!
A people that loves freedom will in the end be free.
I will wage war on the invaders if you send coin!
My army is hungry and our stockpiles are low. Would you mind sending us something?
I need more wood to finish the Cathedral. Can you spare some?
Thank you! I will invest this coin wisely for the good cause.
With your help, my men will no longer fight on an empty stomach.
A divided nation will be easily conquered by the Americans. I must rally my men!
The Aztec Skull Knights are a terrifying sight!
The British are preparing a fierce attack on our lands. They think that we owe them something.
The firepower of the Dutch army is so pervasive that it turned the sky dark.
The hooves of the French horses will bring us before our maker, if we do not act soon.
My Soldados report that they fail to pierce through the sturdy German war wagons with their lances and bayonets.
The Iroquois are expanding their territory, pillaging our villages!
The Ottomans were lucky to have contructed their bombards earlier. I was still missing wheels for the mortars.
We are out of resources. The Portuguese Empire has claimed everything. As usual.
With a never-ending stream of Strelets on the front line and a swarm of Oprichniks in our town, fate has abandoned us.
The Sioux are too fast even for our best cavalry. How are we supposed to catch up with them?
We might not rid ourselves from the shackles of Spanish oppression today.
Even without their cannons, I expect the Swedes to run in guns blazing any time now.
The sailors in Rome are dancing to celebrate our demise.
Maltese knights are brave, but let us show them what we are capable of when we are cornered!
These Chinese rockets hurt even more than the sting of a habanero pepper. Have you ever tried one?
If Japan was not so shy with other nations, this could have been the start of a nice friendly treaty.
The Indian elephants are stomping us into submission. If we lose this, my people will be no better off than before!
The Americans are expanding south to add to their union. Let's hope our borders never meet.
The Aztec Empire might survive another day, but it cannot avoid the inevitable.
These British are like a tiny dog. All bark, no bite.
My settlers wear the same rags as the Dutch, but their banks are still bringing in great profit.
We all have a tough time, but these Coureurs des Bois are a hardy bunch.
Those Germans might not have the most advanced army, but they sure are advancing.
The Iroquois are building a new longhouse, preparing more space in which to imprison us.
The Ottomans cannot afford many cannons, but even in low numbers they sure pack a punch!
We can hold back their army, but even Portuguese town centers are conquering the land.
I did not think it possible that there ever could be more Strelets than Guerrilleros, but it happened!
Sioux raiders have turned our countryside into no man's land. Not even the bandidos want it.
Spanish oppression may last another decade, but my children will rise again, even if we lose today.
The Swedes took control of the map faster than expected! It will not happen again!
We could have had great trading relations with the Italians, but instead they doomed us both.
How did we end up fighting the Knights of Saint John? This was a terrible mistake for both of us.
The Chinese are experts with gunpowder, but it seems that they are not bad with classic warfare either.
What a pity. I wanted to send a scientific mission to Japan, but we do not seem to be welcome right now. Also, I have no scientists left.
This sepoy uprising is defeating our peasant uprising. Now everyone's lands are ruined.
You need to pull us out of this sinkhole, old friend.
It is looking so bad for us, I feel the urge to visit my Cathedral and confess my sins to a padre.
We have the momentum, but should we overstay our welcome?
Your ferocity is an inspiration to our team!
Keep your spirits up, friend! I will hold them off, then you deliver the finishing blow.
My people have lost their faith and their hope. We are fighting for a lost cause.
My dreams for a united Gran Colombia are shattered. My friend, let us surrender before our civilians are slaughtered for our pride.
I would say that things look desperate for us, but I genuinely do not want to be mistaken for a desperado.
The enemy is afraid of the Colombian army! Let us make them confront their fears!
It is always good to be on friendly terms with the local population.
You beat me to this one, my friend.
Good catch, but do not let the bandidos see you!
That treasure will fetch a fine price.
You should use that food to feed your people.
Do not forget to use those treasures for an army, they are more than fancy trinkets!
I prefer that you look outside my base for future endeavours.
The people of these lands know more than you think. Use their skills wisely!
It never hurts to have more help.
What will it be, a weapon for your army, or a house for your settlers?
I have claimed a treasure! This will help us in our plans.
I found a centavo! Let us hope that it brings us luck!
Only he who is not hungry says the coconut has a hard shell.
Do not worry, friend. I will pay you back with interest, by winning our battles.
There are enough treasures for both of us, my friend. I know a few spots where some conquistadores died with their stolen gold.
This local guide will provide important knowledge of the map.
A lost soul was found, happy to help our cause!
Someone cut firewood, but never got around to lighting it.
These walls will protect our people while we plan our offensive.
The combined power of our cultures will bring them to their knees!
We have been waiting to raid your revenue. I think that the time has come.
How can this cowardice be rewarded? Come and face me on the battlefield!
Morals and lights are our first necessities.
Do not compare your material forces with those of the enemy. Spirit cannot be compared with matter. You are human beings, they are beasts. You are free, they are slaves.
The first duty of a government is to give education to the people.
Your technological prowess will not help you against the wrath of my Guerrilleros!
Now that we are on more equal footing, let us have a fair fight. I will send my first Soldado.
You are late! Was your siesta maybe a little too long?
Trying to hide from everyone? Our Guerrilleros have been watching you the whole time.
Living so close to my ally is not wise. I will always defend my dear friends!
I am Simon Bolivar, El Libertador. What are you doing here? Are you with the Spanish?
Appearances are deceiving. God grants victory to perseverance.
There is an even easier way out of this - just surrender and become part of Gran Colombia.
A tree born twisted will never straighten its branches. Just like you never change the map!
Your alliance does not scare me, for I have fate itself on my side.
You might think yourself safe this time, but all injustice will be punished, no matter the odds!
I hereby expel your explorer from my lands. Return, and you will face punishment without mercy!
Oh, how cute. Is that your army, or a Mariachi band?
Are you here for a visit? Have a look around, we are a very welcoming people.
Your army is dwarfed by the count of my villagers alone. Do not expect them to just surrender.
My base is prepared, are you?
You can take our buildings, but you will never take our freedom!
Your men might not fit into my base, at least not in one piece.
So, that pompous palace is your Town Center? How revolting.
It is harder to release a nation from servitude than to enslave a free nation.
Flee the country where a lone man holds all power: It is a nation of slaves.
Though I may die, I shall be remembered forever. You all will soon be forgotten.
I must admit, my defeat is the price that I will pay, for peace for my people.
You may think yourself wise, but this trading post was the only thing between you and my insurgent followers.
Do you really want to crawl through the dirt for those few resources?
Who did you have to murder to gather this token of injustice?
All the gold in the world will not be enough to save you from our wrath!
Are you even eating off the ground now? May that food keep you alive a little longer.
Your people cannot produce enough to satisfy your hunger? You truly are a desperado.
Your greed will come back to haunt you, mark my words!
Stealing from me? I will ask some bandidos to get it back.
This native warrior will only lead you to meet your demise faster.
Forcing peasants to work for you? Keep it up -- because of such treatment, the Colombian people became independent.
You build more walls, but my people have already faced far greater hardships than that.
I will teach the locals and in return, they will teach me.
God helps he who rises early.
You do not check the teeth of a free horse.
The riches of this land do not belong to you, they belong to the people, my people.
Ah good! I haven't had breakfast yet.
I was only bringing this treasure to its rightful owner – the people of this land – before the invader, you, could take it!
My supporters in the countryside left another cache of resources for me.
More locals join the rebellion against you!
Another helping hand for the Colombian economy!
Settlers are still flocking to my righteous cause.
This wood comes in handy. What will I build with it? A Cathedral? A Fort? Or weapons to beat you with?
Try to appease them all you want, but they will always prefer joining Gran Colombia over being ruled by you.
A trading post? My fellow men have already burned down more impressive buildings.
A monopoly? My people will not be oppressed, militarily or economically!
Your control over the trade routes is over. Admit defeat and avoid further bloodshed!
Send word across our empires--we must enlist anyone old enough to hold a weapon! We cannot allow such a pitiful victory!
This was already part of my plan.
You want me to train more artillery? I invented artillery!
Of course. Everyone fears the charge of my cavalry!
I see that your troops are stuck. Don't worry! My elite infantry will bail them out.
I do not wish to pay tribute at this time.
Sorry, what did you say? My new cannons are so loud!
Winter has been hard on my troops. You must wait before we can fight again.
What you are asking is simply impossible!
I need time to muster my troops.
Our Trading Posts have been destroyed! How can we acquire saffron now?
What is sweeter than Aztec chocolate? The smell of victory!
These British will not rule our icy seas!
These Dutch have no idea how to prepare a good herring, and it will lead to their defeat!
These French are ready to meet their Waterloo today.
The Germans sold us their soldiers; now we're beating them with their own men!
These Ottomans could not keep their gunpowder dry, and that has led to their downfall.
The shipbuilding techniques of the Portuguese will not save them now.
Who fears the Russians? I am the king in the north!
How do you break the Spanish Tercio? - With a cannonball! Ha-ha-ha!
The Chinese invented gunpowder, and I showed them how to use it.
The Japanese didn't shy away from a fight, but their honor could not save them from superior weaponry!
No Indian elephant is too big for my cannons!
The Aztec Jaguar warriors with their obsidian blades are worthy foes for my lion-hearted soldiers!
The British have built a professional army and expanded their arsenal. Time to launch an attack!
It's getting serious. The Dutch sold all of their tulips to field more cannons than I can.
The armor of the French cuirassiers gleams in the sun. I shall respond with the light of my cannons!
The Germans must have untold riches to muster such a big army. We should sack their towns!
The Ottoman artillery is loud and numerous, but my gunners can also hit their targets!
The Portuguese outmaneuver us and know how to keep our troops at bay.
The Russians have reformed their army and hold numerical superiority. Follow my lead!
The Spanish deploy their forces with excellence, but can they compete with mine?
The mighty Chinese army is upgrading its weaponry. Let us attack now or they will tip the odds in their favor!
The Japanese Samurai are carving their way through our ranks with their sharp katanas. Impressive.
Cannons on elephants, sword whips and blade arms. The Indians are trying to outsmart us!
Uh... I'm right behind you! It won't be long...
Already? Tell me, how do you manage to develop so quickly?
Don't stay in the first age. Marvelous technologies await us!
You must advance to the next age! Technological advancements will lead to our victory!
Be careful. If your economic production does not grow, nor will your military.
Finally, now we can get started.
This battle is not in my interest, I shall focus my attention elsewhere in my empire.
My camp is under attack! I request your aid so that I can turn this tide!
My name is Gustavus Adolphus. I am destined for greatness!
If you send me your battle plans I can make adjustments that will bring us victory!
A higher difficulty this time? I see that you are finally rising to my level!
Don't think I'll go easy on them just because you lowered the difficulty setting!
Your ferocity is comparable to mine. Let us both overwhelm our enemies with it!
I am grateful to have you by my side again.
I'm glad you understand the value of having me as an ally, rather than as an enemy.
Just give me a shout when you need my help again.
We know this map well, my friend. An excellent advantage.
It wasn't my fault that we lost last time. I trust you're done warming up?
We are a dream team. Let us march all away across the land!
I was forced to pay ransom for my explorer. Such a fall from grace from our proud past...
Consider this a partial repayment of those... ancient debts I owe you.
The cod catch was great this year. Here, share it with me.
In Sweden we season our food with nothing but salt, but we do have lots of it! Here, have some.
My forests are vast and my lumberjacks very efficient. You can have this wood, as a token of our friendship.
With this timber you just might construct an empire as vast as mine!
If we wait much longer, we will lose the advantage of surprise. I must march to battle!
We will win this war by always making the first move. March, men!
I will crush these natives the same way that I crushed the Snapphanes!
Let's see if your invisible hand can stop me from plundering your trade!
With God and the victorious arms, we shall win this fight!
My army needs room to expand. I shall build another military base.
I shall found a new city for the Swedish Empire!
Take this coin. You seem like you need it.
Do you like fish? I can throw you a red herring.
We'll send you some of our finest lumber!
If an ally is in need, Sweden will answer!
I do not do well in peacetime... perhaps we could start just a tiny war?
All of this inaction is making my troops anxious.
My population is too small to support my giant army. Could you spare me some coin?
Winter has been harsh in Sweden. Could you spare us some food?
I used my last wood to build a giant goat and someone burned it down. Could you spare me some of yours?
We'll spend the coin wisely on our technological advancement.
It's no pickled herring, but it will have to do.
We'll craft masterful constructions with your wood. Many thanks.
The Aztecs are dominating the battlefield. Today, I have sacrified my honor.
The British have defeated us! We shall not be ruling the waves today.
The Dutch have come to pillage my settlement... again!
I did not expect such fierceness from the French. Today, I shall surrender.
The Germans are furious. Are they still upset about Magdeburg - or is it my name?
I cannot believe that the Ottomans are running us off... again!
I do not want to become lost in the smoke from the Portuguese cannons. We should pull back.
The Russian army is too big for a pitched battle. We should retreat to fight another day.
The Spanish came for our gold, but we spent it all on this lost war! We should surrender.
Let the Chinese be the central kingdom so long as we can keep the north.
United under one banner and with all of their swords facing us, the Japanese fighting prowess is too much to handle.
Camelry and elephants trample my horses... why did I decide to pick a fight with the Indians?
Let us negotiate a truce with the Aztecs, so my botanists can at least take a good look at their floating gardens.
The British are still using archers on the battlefield? It seems that I underestimated this ancient weaponry.
These Dutch took all of our fish! No wonder we have been defeated.
We are no match for the mighty French. An alliance will be in our interests for the next war.
The Germans noticed that the Schwedentrunk doesn't taste like beer. We should break camp - now!
It appears that the Ottomans brought guns of their own. Who would have thought?
The Portuguese opened fire before my cannons were in position. Retreat!
These Russians brought guns to a snowball fight. No wonder we lost.
My soldiers underestimated the length of Spanish pikes. Now victory is literally out of reach.
I hate to admit it, but the inventions of the Chinese leave me stumped. How can I fight against this?
I figured that the Japanese would be too busy fighting among themselves to oppose us, but it seems that I was mistaken.
The Indians fight like tigers, and we just became their prey.
It is time for me to fade away. I have lost the game, and no one is to blame... here I go!
We are in the worst game, we are in last place, and you are the worst part of this team. Do you know how bad that makes you!?
My men march with ferocity! Our victory is ensured!
You are tough as leather! You have proven to be a worthy ally to Sweden!
The Lion of the North roars again! You are honoured to have me by your side.
Today we were outsmarted! Let us resign and fight again another day.
A good general recognizes when the battle is lost. Let us resign with honor.
I am longing to go back to Stockholm. Can we stop this bloodshed?
Our enemy lives a life of wealth through trade. If we let them continue like this, it will put my treasury to shame.
Many of the natives have been rallied to oppose us. Such auxiliaries benefit our enemy far too well.
I hope that we can find many treasures in this new world.
Is that the most exotic find that this place has to offer?
Spend that food wisely. An army cannot march on an empty stomach!
Don't tell me that you will be ignoring the war to pursue your treasure hunting obsession?
That discovery was in my territory! Keep to your own lands!
You may recruit help from the locals if you so wish.
A passable demonstration of kindness. At least you made the settlers happy.
As exotic that wood might be, will the houses you build with them be as beautiful as mine?
I have claimed a treasure! Soon, my future vision will be reality.
As soon as these coins are polished, they will be fit for my coffers!
Enough food for seconds at my banquet!
I figured that you were not interested in keeping that for yourself.
I'm quite enjoying this treasure hunt.
An extra pair of helping hands from those who know the land better than us.
My daring expedition to rescue these settlers was a success!
I wonder how many Dalecarlian horses I can carve with this wood?
I did not build this wall because I cannot stand the outside world. I just need a break from it.
Wealth is imminent! Tonight we shall feast as our forefathers did.
So, you have chosen the coward's way to to victory? It will cost you dearly!
A king, warlord, and businessman. That's me!
You may have new tools at hand, but do you have anyone to use them?
You... do know how to age up, right?
Are you still an age behind? Your mother would be so ashamed of you!
You have advanced to the next age? We will be there shortly and outshine your technological advances!
Well, you can't place first every time... or ever, in your case.
Aaaand in last place we have... you! Congratulations!
Are you building a vacation cabin for yourself over there?
I could not imagine wanting to live so close to your neighbor.
I am Gustavus Adolphus, the Lion of the North. Today you will hear me roar!
You think that last time was hard? It was a mere military exercise!
You think that this will be easier? War is never easy!
I recognize this part of the woods! I used to defeat my foes here.
The Swedish Empire is small, yet you bring all of these allies? We shall meet on the battlefield!
Through my guidance, my alliance will crush your empire!
You come to look for a king?
I see that you have assembled your army. Maybe you can pick off a moose or two with it.
What is your retinue doing here? Oh, is this your army? Could have fooled me.
Aahh! My cannonballs will turn your army into meatballs!
I have faced far worse odds than this!
My base is going up in flames like my beloved Vasa! Vengeance will be mine!
This is the force that you send to fight the Swedish Empire? You insult me!
This is your base? How very... quaint.
This is quite nice, don't you think? Why don't you delete those troops of yours? Surely you don't need them in such... peaceful times?
We shall fight again another day, but for now, I request to resign.
A great general recognizes defeat. May I offer my surrender?
Just a minor dent in my plan.
Oh, you found your first treasure. How cute.
Keep scouting for knick-knacks. They won't help you against my mighty army!
You found some gold? It's worth nothing in the hands of incapable leaders.
That's probably all the food that you need to feed your pitiful army.
Sure, pick up all of these scraps. It won't help you face my military might!
You sure are greedy, but it won't help you!
A whole new world to explore, and you choose to steal from me? Pathetic!
Those natives will not be happy to have been taken under your wing once the nest is on fire.
Your workforce has scattered through the wilderness, so now you must herd them back like sheep?
I deserved that wood. My woodworking is much more skillful than yours.
Walls? I'll blast right through them!
The locals fight with me! Clearly, they recognize who is superior.
The locals know who has the best goods for trading!
This gold will pave the way for Swedish supremacy in these new lands!
I would kill for some fresh Swedish fish...
These resources are best used in capable hands. Let me help you with this.
Unlike yours, my explorer is efficient in finding new treasures.
The natives will repay that favor by bringing me your head.
I can see it in these settlers' eyes - they are relieved to be working for me rather than for you.
More workers for the Swedish Empire!
With this wood I shall build a Torp.
You feel the need to drag natives into our war? So be it.
The locals are trading with you only because they haven't met me yet.
A true general fights on the battlefield, but whatever floats your boat.
Here we either make Italy, or we die.
Now we only need to cling to our empire of commerce like the Medicis!
The beat of my cannonfire will teach a lesson they will never forget.
The heavy plashing of our horses' hoofs will signal our brisk approach.
My infantry will make a forced march to catch them off guard.
I only have a sabre and a carbine, which I carry on the front of my saddle.
I can offer neither pay, nor quarters, nor food; I offer only hunger, thirst, forced marches, battles and death.
Recruitment for my next expedition has not completed.
I will not endanger my people for such a wasteful endeavour.
My men are still weary from our last adventure.
Our traders have been robbed of their rightful posts!
The United States, once admirable in their fight for liberty, have fallen from fates favor. Down with king Washington!
Soon I can found the United Aztec Republic, free from tyranny!
A shame to see the British in such shambles. Even the Forum Romanum looks more stable.
My men are eager to gain their share of the Dutch banks when this expedition succeeds.
I would not lose sleep over a French monarch losing his head.
Are we fighting Prussia or Austria now? It does not matter. Let us finish off these Germans!
Unless there are a hundred Forest Prowlers still in hiding, the coming battle will be as swift as it will be decisive!
A pitiful end for the Maltese, I had the pleasure of fighting along them in my first battle.
Portuguese exploration skills did not translate well into military victories today.
Soon we can rebuild the Genoese trading posts in the Black Sea and trade in Russian ports tax free!
These Spanish royalists do nothing but issue a few bombastic proclamations – and keep themselves out of harm's way.
Once the Chinese emperor surrenders, the Forbidden City will be open to everyone!
Japanese swords have quite an edge, but our bayonets also have a point.
I hope to capture a boatload of Indian spices – I have some old friends who can turn it into a boatload of money!
Posterity will call the United States the Great Emancipator, a more enviable title than any crown could be, and greater than any merely mundane treasure.
I heard stories of the old Aztecs on my journeys, but I never expected to receive such a lively example of their power!
Once enemy to despotism, friend of the oppressed, the British Empire has forsaken its destiny. Let us take it down!
Even while at odds with the French, I have the utmost respect for our brother-republicans.
The Germans seem to have put aside their internal quarrels and united their firepower. Luckily, I have done the same for my beloved Italy.
I always thought the Sicilians are the scarier islanders. Today the Maltese knights have proven me wrong!
If they could, the Portuguese would construct Town Centers on the stars. Per aspera ad astra!
I once sold oranges to Russia in Taganrog; they may not have enjoyed their taste – for now they are coming after us!
The Spanish Bourbons are a thorn in my side! I will need to succeed where Pisacane failed!
Here's the plan: If the Swedes attack, we just kill their leader in the fray of battle and we win the war!
The Chinese weaponry is ingenious. Leonardo da Vinci would be jealous.
The fighting spirit of these Japanese Samurai is the one our troops need to win.
I hear the stomping of Indian elephants at night, but I do not know if they are so close, or just haunting me from afar.
Mamma mia! You race through the ages like a red Roman chariot!
Your technological progress is faster than the Bersaglieri can run. Breathtaking!
Without the benefits of Commerce, we can never hope to defeat our enemies.
Do not be afraid to age up – new things await you!
A splendid feat, now take the battle to our enemies as soon as you can!
Ah! You've finally returned from your travels – or from exile? I know how time flies, I have been through the same.
We are facing great adversity on the field of battle, I am close to admitting defeat.
My republic has seen better days than these, I must resort to asking you for immediate help.
Anyone who wants to carry on the war against the oppressors, follow me! Anyone who loves his country, follow me!
To arms, all – all of you!
There is no shame in choosing a lower difficulty, but do not expect remorse from me now.
You have conquered and you will conquer still, because you are prepared for the tactics that decide the fate of battles.
To this wonderful page in our country's history, another more glorious still will be added, with your valuable help.
Did I leave such a memorable impression on you that I have been chosen as your ally this time?
The hour of battle will find me with you again, by the side of the champions of Italian liberty.
Odd. I have been to this country before! – Can we travel to another country next time?
And so we meet again, marching together to the redemption of our brothers who are still slaves of the stranger.
We shall meet again before long to march to new triumphs.
Being extorted to save my explorer has only strengthened my resolve!
Take this and hire some mercenaries for our next battle. If you don't know where to look, I know a guy.
Our farmers were particularly industrious today, here are some tomatoes!
You know the feeling: Someone cooked too much pasta. Have some!
Put this fine cypress wood to good use!
Cypress forests sprawl my land; I am glad to be rid of some of it.
I have mustered my men, our spirits are high, their town will lay in ruins by tonight!
The freedom of our people is near!
I am not afraid to get right up to my enemies and build in their front garden.
The more Italian city states, the better!
As long as my people do not go hungry, I will provide you with Food.
A lot of trees must fall for this; only time will tell if I can fell enough.
If you ever should be so circumstanced as to require the help of an ally, cursed be the Italian who would not step forward with me in defence.
This is not the carnival in Venice. We will not mask ourselves. We will go in all guns blazing!
I saw the bottom of my war chest today, I need Coin urgently!
My people are starving, I can't maintain my armies this way. Please send me some of your bread.
I have promised a nice priest to repair the Basilica, but I am in need of some of your timber!
My war chest is overflowing now! Let us bring down some monarchies!
We will have a great feast tonight then!
The United States should be an example to us – their unity makes them unbreakable!
The Aztecs are not discouraged by their losses. On the contrary, they seem encouraged to fight on!
It is somewhat humiliating that my revolutionary Redshirts are losing to British Redcoats – but there are just too many.
Whether the world economy booms or collapses, the banks always win. A Medici would be handy now. Too bad they are dead.
We will make the French pay! For the Tapestries of Raffaele, shot through with French bullets! Let them pay for the losses—no, not the losses, but the insult cast on Michelangelo!
The German needle guns are devastating; my army is in stitches.
The forests are filled with tomahawks, handy while chopping trees, but my Villagers refuse to go now.
The Maltese knights must be getting support from the Pope again. I should have marched on Rome when I had the chance!
The grip and reach of the Ottoman Empire rivals that of the Roman Empire. Legions of Janissaries subdue these lands.
I wish that I and my fellow Brazilian Revolutionaries were more successful against these Portuguese puppet rulers when we still had a chance!
Is it always this cold here? Or why is the Russian empire thriving today? – Quick, someone hand me my poncho!
I was wrong, South America's horses are not the best in the world.
As if it could not get any harder the Spanish decided to create the Kingdom of Two Sicilies. One Sicily is enough!
One more Carolean charge and I will have no one left to countercharge.
The Chinese still have so much gunpowder left stored after beating us that they are starting to shoot it in the air for fun!
The Japanese kids seem to have learnt a lot about our weaknesses when they visited Italy ages ago. Crazy!
The Americans call us gangsters, but look at them! Cowboys, Owlhoots, and Gunslingers roam the countryside!
I had a terrible day. I woke up and stepped on a War Hut. I ate breakfast and bit on an Eagle Scout.
The British Longbowmen may have a tea break before they take a shot, but our Pavisiers were even slower to place their shields in time.
Even the Papal Guards were unnerved by the sheer amount of Dutch halberdiers. Like roses made of steel.
These French think themselves on the side of fine arts and culture, yet half of their heroes are Italians! I have had enough!
The German mercenary swords are only feeble reeds now, but we have suffered one too many sword blows, too.
The Maltese order of knights is almost down to their last man, but – who is that terrifying Scottish swordsman?
We offered so little resistance that the Ottomans will capture the rest of Italy just as easily as the Venetian colonies!
If we do not improve our situation, our people and those of Portugal might join together and overthrow us all, and then make their own republic, since none of us are fit to rule.
The Russian Oprichniki made no difference whipping their own workers and ours. Unfortunately, their troops cost less than our expensive mercenaries.
Where, I ask, are the Carabinieri when you need them most?! Not a single one!
Spain seems to have an economic crisis, but dragged us into it as well. Only a fat Spanish treasure ship can save us now.
The Swedes seem to be low on gunpowder, but at this point they can beat us even with their blades alone.
I don't know for how much longer our Pavese shields can stop those Chinese Chu Ko Nu bolts!
Japan is composing a lot of poetry lately; their favorite new topic seems to be our demise.
Unfortunately, Marco Polo did not show us everything about India that we should have seen.
I am in mighty company! Sadly, I can not keep up with you.
When this war started, I had full confidence in our alliance. I am reconsidering my choice of allies now.
It is a great day to be alive! We shall not let this victory slip through our fingers!
I have never met a great tactician like you! It is an honor for every Italian to have fought alongside you in this war.
I am a gentle soul and thus I will forgive you for not performing to my standards. Luckily I outdid myself this time, which will grant us this victory.
A treacherous Minister of war squandered doubloons, supporting his splendid banquets in the first capitals of Europe.
If there were still powder and shot, we would continue the fight—not for victory, not to save ourselves, but for honor!
I have nothing around me but men lying down overcome with fatigue, and hear no sound except the lamentations of the unfortunate wounded, not yet transported to the hospital.
We have allowed our sworn enemies to build up their trade. Now it is time for us to rectify that mistake.
They have already befriended the local population. We cannot win a war in a land where the populace is against us – we must start making allies as well!
Already living off the land are you? Great to see you adapt so quickly to these circumstances.
We should leave nothing behind for the enemy, take all that you can!
I wonder who left their purse behind.
Ah! Cantucci! What a sweet surprise!
I should pay close attention to your treasure-gathering technique, it is very efficient.
I was saving that one for later!
It is not a bad shout to get to know the locals better.
He who finds a friend, finds a treasure.
Extraordinary to find so many planks in the wild.
Exquisite treasures in this region! I want to bring a few of them to my island home on Caprera.
A treasure full of coin! My old pirating instincts do not leave me hanging!
Ahh! Some cheese, some olive oil and tartufo. A firework for the senses!
I hope you did not need that treasure. Eventually it is a team effort, right?
Ahh! This is just like in my early days traveling through South America.
We found a lost soldier who will teach us the way of fighting in these lands.
A new member joins the liberation front of Italy!
This wood will house my next military expedition.
All great Italian cities have proper walls! Genoa, Milan, Pisa, Florence, Venice, Rome... – and even I am bit of an architect myself!
Let us beat these greedy capitalists at their own game!
If this is the end, I am pleased that we could at least settle our disputes in a civilized manner.
Your loss is imminent! To save face, I can offer you a place in our Basilica. There is plenty of space, and you can also atone for your sins and other failures.
You think your fighters can handle such advanced weaponry without blowing themselves to pieces? Better hand it over to me now before anyone gets hurt.
Have you taken a break? Forgotten about your... 'Empire'?
The old Romans were arrogant, but they would have been right to call you barbarian – considering how far you are behind.
Keep repeating the same strategies and you will need to get patched up! Because after I perfectly countered your plan, you will need one for your bruises.
Ready or not, here my rush comes. Or not.
Welcome to the age of your destruction!
All alone hiding in the wilderness? Watch out for the wolves. They are hungry!
This town of yours is so close to my ally. Unless it wants to become a part of Italy, it is going to be in trouble!
I am Giuseppe Garibaldi and my favorite enemies are oppressive, corrupt monarchs who tax too much. Did I describe you well?
Your timid doctrinaires can carry their servility and miserable fears elsewhere. This people is its own master!
We will no longer follow in the trail of men whose hearts are foul.
There is no point in lying, Pinocchio. Your wooden nose came a little too close to the fire in the last game!
I have a memory of this place – and I will use that knowledge to bring about your defeat.
Our odds may look odd, but I won worse!
You asked for a battle, we will give you a war.
Your explorer does not seem so bad. But our explorer rediscovered the Americas! How do you top that, eh?
Even the Pope commands more Papal Guards than you have men in your army.
I know, I know! The Basilica looks truly magnificent. Surely that is why some of your men are paying me a visit?
Our barricades are strong and numerous! The bastions crowned with cannons to fire upon the enemy! And the young army, impatient with warlike ardor, is placed at points where the attack is expected!
This battle will not even be my magnus opus – let me direct this opera anyway.
You barbarian! You destroy and ransack like the Huns just for the sake of it! I shall avenge this insult!
Are these your emissaries? – or did I already buy off all the mercenaries that were available? Curious.
Your people must be unhappy with your rule, working for a town in such disarray.
We have a little problem. My men just cannot agree on how to defeat you. All options seem promising!
My comrades have a plan to overthrow your despotic rule that steals your worker's incomes and builds an empire on violence!
He who dies for his country has lived long enough. Let us end this?
Today I am obliged to retire, but for a few days only. Do you accept?
You have not just disappointed me with your unjustly aggression, you have disappointed the world.
You gather treasures, I gather people looking for freedom.
Take what you can, while you still can.
Oh, I think I lost that treasure here a decade ago, thanks for picking it up, I will collect it soon.
With some salt and olive oil, it is going to taste magnificient!
Your indiscriminate looting of the countryside will turn the populace against you – to my advantage!
Looting your treasuries seems more and more lucrative. Keep going!
Feel right at home in my base, soon enough a prison here will house you forever.
You really needed to drag the inhabitants into this? Royals – always need to make a scene...
Another poor soul that needs to be freed from a tyrant. I will gladly be that Spartacus.
That wood will not be sufficient to build a chair to fit your rich, royal... body.
Walls, walls... no battle? What are you, a Roman tortoise? Come out and play!
Natives of the country, and therefore perfectly acquainted with every place, choose the most thorny spots for their ambushes.
First of many! Even the Medici had their humble beginnings.
My natural instinct for exploration will always grant me the best treasure on the map.
An old pirate friend left this one for me.
This food will make the rations for my next expedition.
That treasure was not yours. It was already there before you invaded this land.
I know you cannot compete in treasures against an experienced explorer like me, but you could try a little harder.
A local scout joined my army, he knows the perfect spot to ambush you!
I will save the people lost in this land from your tyranny!
Even strangers are eager to join my new nation.
This wood will make my town more beautiful than yours, and more defensible.
I will make acquaintances with the locals soon; they will not fight on the wrong side for long.
You might be the first to trade, but I will be the one to make a profit.
Our Italian merchants will teach you a lesson in building a real trade empire.
The Pope forbade the usury of our Lombards, so we had no choice but to fall back on a more honest type of business.
It looks like the Carolean charge is no match for the Italian countercharge!

Can use Fame and the Decree card for extra bonuses. Starts with Independence units enabled. Can build multiple Saloons and Barracks from the Discovery Age. Minutemen gather after every destroyed building.\nTeam bonus: Start with a free Miner.\nBest units: Marine, Ranger.

George Washington is known as a modest, unambitious man who readily deferred to peers with more expertise. When the Continental Congress appointed him commander in chief of the Continental Army, Washington faced the great challenge of maintaining the morale and discipline of an irregular army that was outclassed by its British adversaries on most parameters.

Upgrades Command Posts to Command Centers which have increased attack and hitpoints, and outlaw-type units cost less population. Commanders can build Saloons which train all American outlaws for Fame.

1 Flagship and 4 Privateers\n \nOutlaw-type units cost changed to Fame

Giuseppe Garibaldi is an impassioned and daring leader. In battle, his stubborn defense against all odds can prove both tenacious and effective, while his subsequent counterattacks will be swift as they are decisive. Knowing the advantages modern technology can bring, he will invest his nations resources towards a plethora of economic and military upgrades.

Can use Fame and the Decree card for extra bonuses. Torps spawn potted trees when built. Gets free Fishing Boats with every Age and with every villager shipment. Military buildings train and research faster.\nTeam Bonus: Fishing Boat gather rates increased.\nBest units: Skarpskytt, Handgonne.

Gustavus Adolphus is renowned as an innovator on the battlefield, revolutionizing infantry tactics and instilling in his armies an aggressive disposition and increased mobility to maximize the strength of his relatively small armies. Under his direction, the Swedish military has become exceedingly versatile, employing light cannons and mobile cavalry to support his aggressive infantry maneuvers.

Known as the founder of the Bavarian Illuminati in 1776, Adam Weishaupt served as Grand Inquisitor for the Circle of Ossus, a secret cult seeking power, riches and eternal life. Weishaupt used the Illuminati as cover up for rebuilding the Circle to its former glory after the defeat in the Americas.

- Over 60 new maps have been added as "official maps" spanning across America, Asia, Africa and the Middle East. Most of the maps were taken from the ESOC map pool and were improved visually, had layout issues fixed, and were updated with new content such as new fauna, flora, treasures, natives and textures.
 
- The game with the mod on is now more compatible with Win10 and Win11, having the display settings fixed if the game's exe is not set to run in WinXP compatibility mode. The High/Low poly Cliffs option has also been fixed, usefull for custom maps with cliff framerate drops.
 
- Ottomans are now a semi-Asian civilization, with a changed Mosque to better match the Monastery, with access to Export and a Consulate with new unique Asian allies (Indians, Chinese and Japanese), and new cards for the Consulate and mercs. Ottomans can now also pause and resume Settler training at will.
 
- Ships can now sail over shallows on which ground units can also walk. Ships are no longer blocked by shallows such as those on Northwest Territory and Indochina, which also means you can now dock and make ships on Bayou.
 
- Ships now fire consistently and accordingly to their assigned rate of fire, instead of firing random cannon shots which could have resulted in cases where in a fight between two identical ships, the one that fired first could lose because of random cannon fire.
 
- When gathering from Mills and Plantations, villagers now stand still just like on Farms and Rice Paddies. They no longer move randomly around the building, bumping into each other and loosing precious gather time. Gather rates were adjusted accordingly.
 
- Further AI improvements, specifically related to attacking enemy units, upgrading trade routes and training mercs and natives.
 
- Map sizes have been tweaked, making most maps bigger, and the player can now spawn on both sides on all maps, old and new.
 
- Added new Fire Pit dances and made some of them random; the first four Ages will unlock one fixed dance and one random dance. Also randomized shipments for Native and Asian Age Up options, just like Politicians and Consulate allies previously.
 
- The AIs for the mod's civilizations now have unique voice lines! Go to "Documents\My Games\AoE3 Improvement Mod" and delete the "AIM" and "Users3" folders to make them work.
